text: The flood destroyed everything, we don’t know what to do.
I’m trying to stay calm and support my family.
Is this really happening? I can’t believe it!
There’s a typhoon coming, and people are so anxious.
Thank you to the volunteers helping out!
Nobody told us anything, we were unprepared.
We’ve been through worse—we’ll get through this.
I feel numb, just watching the news in silence.
I can’t stop shaking, I’m terrified.
Still no electricity but we're managing.
